name: Mad Taxi
description:
MAD TAXI is a top-view game that will test your reaction and concentration.

You are driving a mad taxi driver in a drunken state.

Under the fervent music, have time to click the mouse at the right time to turn and jump, the game becomes more complicated and accelerates with each level, during the arrival control is complicated by alcohol intoxication, you begin to feel dizzy and disoriented, but you need to try not to get killed and deliver the passenger to the destination.
